field_edited_text.value:
Each proposal shall include the following, and only the following:

A. COVERING LETTER



A notarized letter signed by a principal of the Developer warranting
that the facts set forth in the proposal are true to the best of his informa-
tion, knowledge, and belief.



-y
B. INFORMATION REGARDING THE DEVELOPER'S INTENTIONS
1. A statement of the developer's willingness to:
a. Purchase and develop Area 12 in Charles Center under the
terms and conditions of the Proposed Form of Disposition:
Agreement, dated May 18, 1965, if and when the opportu--
nity of entering into such agreement is offered to the de--
veloper. '
? b. Meet the selling price for Development Area 12 as set forth

in the Proposed Form of Disposition Agreement. (An offer
to pay more than the price set forth in the disposition
agreement will not be a factor in the selection of the de-
veloper, unless a sealed bid procedure is utilized, in ac-
cordance with Paragraph 6 of the '"Disposition Procedure
for Development Area 12, Charles Center'' page 18 herein.)

c. Cooperate in the Agency's architectural review process
throughout the entire development process for Area 12, as
specified in the disposition agreement.

2. A statement of the amount the developer is prepared to spend on
his proposed development, including:

a. Amount and source of equity capital.

b. Amount and source of other financing.

c. If equity capital and/or other financing is to be obtained
from sources other than the developer, the proposal must
be accompanied by a statement from such other source or
sources, indicating its (their) willingness to provide the
necessary funds.

C. INFORMATION ABOUT THE DEVELOPER



1. The developer's firm name, address, telephone, and represen-
tative authorized to deal with the Agency.

2. A description of the developer's proposed form of business ~or-
ganization, specifically:

A corporation organized and existing under the laws of ;

or
A non-profit or charitable institution or corporation organized

21
